meanings.definition: A piece in the game of cards, consisting of the five of trumps, or any other five of a suit.
meanings.sent1: During the card game, I was lucky to have a tenace in my hand.
meanings.sent2: The player won the round with a strategic tenace in their possession.
meanings.sent3: At the card table, everyone envied my powerful tenace.
meanings.sent4: Her tenace was like a secret weapon, ensuring her victory.
meanings.sent5: The tenace gleamed in the player's hand, ready to be played at the right moment.

meanings.definition: A hold in wrestling in which a wrestler grasps his opponent's arm.
meanings.sent1: The wrestler executed a perfect tenace on his opponent, gaining the upper hand.
meanings.sent2: In the wrestling match, the crowd gasped as the tenace was applied skillfully.
meanings.sent3: The tenace move left the audience in awe of the wrestler's strength.
meanings.sent4: With a swift tenace, the wrestler controlled the flow of the match.
meanings.sent5: The tenace maneuver showcased the wrestler's expertise and dominance in the ring.
